title: The splendid 'Pipes' town of Gouda in 1927 in color! [AI enhanced]

sources.title: The splendid 'Pipes' town of Gouda in 1927 in color! [AI enhanced]
sources.description: Gouda is a Dutch town that is located in the province of Zuid Holland in The Netherlands. Gouda is well known for its cheese and also for manufacturing pipes for smoking. In this film we see a parade on Gouda's market square in front of the characteristic medieval town hall. The parade depicts rural and local life around Gouda. Some pretty Dutch girls are also dressed-up as human walking tea pots. This film has been motion-stabilized, speed-corrected, restored, enhance and colorized by means of modern Artificial Intelligence video software. Music: Gerard Franklin - "Tiny Bits of You". Source: Beeld En Geluid.
